content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position(-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0)
- Transport belts connecting the mining drill to a wooden chest at position (-12.5, -54.5)
- Wooden chest at position (-12.5, -54.5) storing iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) transferring items from the chest
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) processing iron ore into iron plates

### Copper Ore Mining Facility at Position(53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting copper ore
- Wooden chest at position (52.5, -84.5) storing copper ore

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0) supplied with iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (-20.5, -66.5) transferring items to the furnace
- Transport belts connecting furnaces and inserters

### Iron Plate Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) storing iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -64.5) transferring iron plates to the chest

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using inserters waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source chest or entity has items available for the inserter to pick up to avoid waiting status.

### Errors when furnaces have no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnace is supplied with the necessary ingredients to maintain production efficiency.

### Errors when chests are full
- Regularly check and clear out full chests to prevent production bottlenecks and ensure smooth operation of inserters and other entities.
